publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-965 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Standard's in Scotland's Schools Bill be allotted as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins) - Section 1 to section 9 - up to 40 minutes Section 10 to after section 12 - up to 55 minutes Section 12A to section 19 - up to 1 hour 15 minutes Section 20 to section 40 - up to 1 hour 45 minutes Remainder of the Bill - up to 2 hours 5 minutes Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Supported by: Iain Smith*
